blogPost.excerpt: The very first sponsorship marketplace for Clubhouse 👋 We're letting CH hosts monetize their content by partnering with global brands. Check out the earnings calculator on our website. Applications are open for early access ‍🎉
blogPost.body: The very first sponsorship marketplace for Clubhouse 👋 We're letting CH hosts monetize their content by partnering with global brands. Check out the earnings calculator on our website. Applications are open for early access ‍🎉
blogPost.title: Clubmarket - Clubhouse hosts can get paid through brand sponsorships 💸
blogPost.author: Nimrod Kramer

localize.description: 第一个会所赞助市场 👋 我们让CH主持人通过与全球品牌合作来实现其内容的盈利。查看我们网站上的收益计算器。早期访问的申请已经开放 🎉
localize.tagline: 会所主人可以通过品牌赞助获得报酬💸。

localize.description: 第一個會所贊助市場 👋 我們讓CH主持人通過與全球品牌合作來實現其內容的盈利。查看我們網站上的收益計算器。早期訪問的申請已經開放 🎉
localize.tagline: 會所主人可以通過品牌贊助獲得報酬💸。

previous.title: 30-Year Mortgage Rate in the US moves up to 3.09%, highest since last June and 44 bps above its all-time low of 2.65% in early January. https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z

localize.full_text: 美国30年期抵押贷款利率升至3.09%，为去年6月以来最高，比1月初的历史低点2.65%高出44个基点。https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z。
美國30年期抵押貸款利率升至3.09%，爲去年6月以來最高，比1月初的歷史低點2.65%高出44個基點。https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z。
